chapter.text: Nandao ren wei jingli yiduan zhide ji zhu de shiqi ma?
Wo dique yong yidi hunhe de jingye chuangzaole ren, mudi shi kaoyan ta, suoyi wo shi ta neng ting neng kan.
Wo que yi yindao ta zunxing zhengdao, ta yexu shi gan'en zhe, yexu shi wang'enfuyi zhe.
Wo dique wei bu xinyang zhe zhunbeile tie lian [jiaoliao], tie quan [shoukao] he [huo yu de] liehuo.
Qiancheng zhe [jingwei an la, yuan bi zui'e zhe] bi jiang yinyong [leyuan li]“ke fu er” quanshui tiaozhi de xian jiu,
na shi an la de pu renmen suo yinyong de yi gu quanshui, tamen jiang shi na gu quanshui daliang yong chu.
Tamen luxing shiyue, bing weiju zainan pu jiang zhi ri.
Tamen wei jing'ai ta [an la] er zhenji pinmin [zhu 1], gu'er [zhu 2] he fulu.
[Tamen shuo]:“Women zhi wei huoqu an la de xiyue er zhenji nimen, women buyao nimen de huibao he gan'en.
Women dique weiju cong women de zhujiang shi de kongbu kunan zhi ri [de xingfa].”
Suoyi, an la jiang zhengjiu tamen tuoli na ri de zainan, bing shi tamen rongguang huanfa, xingfu yukuai.
Youyu tamen jianren, ta jiang ci gei tamen leyuan he sichou [zuo de yifu].
[Tamen zai leyuan li jiang] kao zai bao yi shang, ji bu jue yanre, ye bu jue hanleng.
Leyuan de yin ying zhezhe tamen, leyuan de shuiguo shenshou ke zhai.
Yin zhi qimin he shuijing bei jiang chuandi gei tamen,
na shuijing bei qishi yeshi yin zhi de, tamen ke suiyi jueding bei zhong de rongliang [xiang zhuang duoshao, jiu zhuang duoshao].
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang bei ci yinyong jiang tiaozhi de xian jiu,
na shi leyuan li yi gu ming jiao “se lei se bi lei” de quanshui.
Yongyuan nianqing de tongpu jiang fushi tamen. Dang ni kanjian tamen shi, ni hui yiwei tamen shi san kai de zhenzhu.
Dang ni guankan nali [leyuan] shi, ni jiang kanjian [xiangxiang bu dao de] enze he daguo.
Tamen chuan de yifu shi shang deng lu chou jia jin si zuo de, tamen dai de shi yin shouzhuo. Tamen de zhu jiang ci gei tamen xian jiu.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi gei nimen de baochou, nimen de shangong yi bei jieshou.”
Wo que yi ba “gulanjing” xunxujianjin jiang gei ni [mu sheng],
yinci, ni dang naixin tingcong ni de zhu de panjue, ni buyao fucong tamen zhong de fanzui zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe.
Ni dang zai zaochen [chen li] he xiawu [shang li he bu li] zan nian ni de zhu de zun ming ③.
Yeli, ni dang yong shao bufen shijian koubai ta [zhu][hun li he xiao li], bingyong da bufen shijian zansong ta [ru li “te ha zhu de bai”(shenye libai)].
Zhexie ren [bu xinyang zhe] dique tanlian [duanzan de] jinshi shenghuo, tamen huluele chenzhong zhi ri de xingfa.
Wo chuangzao tamen, bing ci gei tamen qiangjian de tipo. Jiaru wo yiyu, wo jiang yong xiang tamen yiyang de ren lai chedi daiti tamen.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi xiang jiaohui, youzhi zhe ke zi ze yitiao tong xiang ta de zhu de dadao.
Chufei an la yiyu, fouze, nimen jue buneng zheyang zuo. An la que shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
Ta jiang shi tasuo yiyu zhe jinru ta de enhui zhong. Zhiyu bu yi zhe, ta wei tamen zhunbeile tongku de xingfa.
